name: Syntetic - 2D pixel horror cooperation game for 2 players
name_original: Syntetic - 2D pixel horror cooperation game for 2 players
description:
---(Demo)---

Student project of a 2-player coop game made with Unity and Photon.

!NOTE!
The game is designed to be played with exact two players, and it is highly recommended to use discord or other voice comunicator while playing, as for now there is no way of communicating in the game. 

Credits:

  • Marcel Cisowski
  • Bartosz Jaromin
  • Jarema Chyrzyński (art)
